tweets.author: ロックマンシリーズ公式
tweets.text:
The latest installment in the "Mega Man" series has been announced with great fanfare!  
This new title, equivalent to the 12th numbered entry, will showcase how Mega Man has evolved—stay tuned for further updates!  

"Mega Man: Dual Override" is scheduled for release in 2027,

thread_replies.author: 春山 壱樹
thread_replies.text:
#アイロンビーズ 制作日記
#エメラルドドラゴン （#PC88＆ #PC98）より
#タムリン　

と言うことで、久々の作品アップです
昨年に続き今年も誰かのポートレートやイベントの一枚絵を作成しようと思いましたが…多忙につき断念
2頭身ドットでもちゃんと特徴を捉えていていますな。

thread_replies.author: Nicholas Joseph
thread_replies.text:
The new entry's finally here...  
The side-scrolling thrill and visuals are insanely polished, to the point where waiting until 2027 feels like the real hardship.  
Being playable on Switch 2 is the best. Feels like the series is making a comeback.

In the 11 games, Rockman's model was designed with a slightly lower height-to-head ratio than the character design, but DO's Rockman has a taller height-to-head ratio and a more dynamic running style, huh.

thread_replies.author: よこ
thread_replies.text:
38 years ago today was the release date of Mega Man.  
And to commemorate it, I redesigned the title screen  
and made it with iron-on beads,  
which is the photo on the right screen.  
I think it was definitely 4 years ago.  
#ロックマン #アイロンビーズ #一画面再現協会

"Mega Man: Dual Override" is scheduled for release in 2027,

tweets.text: As long as the design is original enough, I don't think it should be a problem? Copying someone else is bad, but someone can create a base design with AI and then draw over it. The less you worry about AI and the more you focus on combating plagiarism, i think that may be better.
